abstract: Shares of the mining giant Rio Tinto were up sharply Thursday on market speculation that it might be taken over by two rivals, BHP Billiton and Companhia Vale do Rio Doce.
lead_paragraph: Shares of the mining giant Rio Tinto were up sharply Thursday on market speculation that it might be taken over by two rivals, BHP Billiton and Companhia Vale do Rio Doce.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Shares Rise on Rumors of a Two-Pronged Bid
